official_title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsements for employment in the coastwise trade and on the Great Lakes for the vessel MARINE STAR.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation for a named vessel.
